ProjectTitle: Form follows function: design, development and application of a new tool to assess how the 3D microstructure of biological tissues changes during mechanical loading
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/06/2023
Since you will use animal tissue samples there are ethical issues, what is the origin of the rat/mouse arteries, if these are collected as part of the different project please list the ethical approval of this project; for use of tissue from laboratory animals obtained outside of KU Leuven please submit the form "Notification animal experiments done outside of KU Leuven/UZ as part of a collaboration" for the use of slaughterhouse material please notify the animal ethical committee using the form: "Notification of replacement (4R) animal experiment" you can find both forms here: https://www.kuleuven.be/animalia/en/forms/index.html
Metadata: Will your instruments generate metadata? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: please note that KU Leuven has a data repository that you can consider as alternative for Zenodo: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr; or use a disciplinary repository, for more information: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
